text: Pittokopos (Greek: Πιττόκοπος) is a locality in Dhrousha in Cyprus, in the Paphos District. == Topography == Pittokopos, Paphos district is a locality and is north of Lefki and southeast of Fásli. Pittokopos has an elevation of 423 metres and is nearby to Agía Aféntrika. == Nearby Places == Dhrousha (2.3 km), Inia (2.4 km), Androlykou (3.4 km), Terra (4.5 km), Kritou Terra (4.9 km) Nearby Cities: Polis Chrysochous == Post Code == Pittokopos Post Code is 8705 == References == Category:Populated places in Paphos District
title: Pittokopos
